title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 28.15 - Training courses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 28.15 - Training courses

State Regulations

The Chief Administrator of the Courts may
provide for such orientation courses, training courses and continuing education
courses for attorneys applying to be arbitrators and for arbitrators as the

Chief Administrator may deem necessary and desirable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
28.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
